heading: Today
text: Showers from Lake Champlain east and south, ending through VT by mid morning, and NH by early afternoon.  Becoming partly sunny through Quebec, spreading southeast in the afternoon, with a few stray showers north.  Breezy and much cooler.  Highs in the 50s to near 60 north, in the 60s south.  Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: A few stray evening showers north, then partly cloudy.  Chilly.  Lows in the 30s, near 30 over the higher terrain north.  Scattered frost in sheltered valleys.  Winds northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph, diminishing in wind-sheltered valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Periods of clouds early giving way to sunshine.  Quite cool.  Highs in the upper 40s to mid 50s.  Winds north to northwest 10 to 15 mph, decreasing through the afternoon.
